languages.text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an Executioner's DoT effect deals damage more than 10% of enemy's max wounds, the target receives a stack of Fatigued.

Whenever a single instance of damage of the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

Whenever a single instance of damage of the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que una sola aplicación del daño de cualquiera de los efectos de daño continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual o superior al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del enemigo, ese enemigo recibe +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que una sola aplicación del daño de cualquiera de los efectos de daño continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual o superior al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del enemigo, ese enemigo recibe +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続ダメージ効果でダメージが1回与えられるたび、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}のスタックを+1得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続ダメージ効果でダメージが1回与えられるたび、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}のスタックを+1得る。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果对敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不低于该名敌人{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%时，该名敌人都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果对敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不低于该名敌人{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%时，该名敌人都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果。

languages.text: Verursacht eine Instanz der Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, der 10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Gegners entspricht oder diese übersteigt, erhält der Gegner +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht eine Instanz der Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, der 10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Gegners entspricht oder diese übersteigt, erhält der Gegner +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une instance d'un effet de dégâts progressifs appliqué par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} équivalents à au moins 10 % des {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} d'un ennemi, ce dernier gagne +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a single instance of damage from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to or more than 10% of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, that enemy gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une instance d'un effet de dégâts progressifs appliqué par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} équivalents à au moins 10 % des {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} d'un ennemi, ce dernier gagne +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}.

languages.text: Когда при одиночном получении периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g} эффекта цель теряет 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} или больше, эта цель получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}.
